com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.lang

Class ThenRuleBuilder<T,U>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.lang.ThenRuleBuilder<T,U>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TerminatingRuleBuilder<T,U>

    public class ThenRuleBuilder<T,U>
extends java.lang.Object
implements TerminatingRuleBuilder<T,U>
    Builds the portion of a Rule that is available in the languate on 'then'.
